home.title: Casino Windsor Canada: Caesars Windsor Resort & Entertainment
home.description: Experience Casino Windsor Canada, a world-class Caesars resort offering luxury accommodation, thrilling gaming, fine dining, and live entertainment. Located in Ontario, it’s one of Canada’s top casino destinations for visitors and players alike.

blocks.text: Casino Windsor Canada: An Unforgettable Gaming Experience and the Best Land-Based Casino Experience in Ontario

items: sports betting
1,550 slot machines
rewards program

blocks.text: Casino Windsor has recently changed its name into Caesars Windsor. The casino is a complete casino, casino floors, hotel, and restaurants, which is located in Windsor, Ontario on the banks of Detroit River. Here one will find beautiful experiences and opportunities as compared to an online casino.

The casino is now considered to be one of the largest gaming complexes in Canada. This casino is a location that consists of over 100,000 square meters containing hundreds of slot machines and tables, a major hotel complex, and all types of flavored restaurants.
Casino Windsor Login Procedure

The terms and conditions of guests in Casino Windsor are quite liberal. According to the Canadian gambling legislation, sports betting and casino games may be accessed by everyone who is at least 19 years old. In order to be part of the rewards program, you have to be 21 years old.

In order to access the casino, the guests are required to produce an official government issued photo ID that validates their identity and age. This may be an ID card, national or international passport or a driver license.
When one enters the Casino Windsor, casino employees in the reception desk can demand an identification or rewards program membership card.
Please make sure that you follow the dress code. The dress code is not very rigid in Casino Windsor. Nevertheless, it is preferable to mishandle tracksuits, beachwear, slipping shoes, etc.
Advantages and Disadvantages of Casino Windsor

Casino Windsor is the destination of thousands of Canadians as well as international visitors each month. It has various events such as poker and other gambling tournaments. The casino also presents very good prospects of a full entertainment experience.
Advantages

items: Favors convenient location in downtown, Windsor and is accessible to both Canada and United States players;
Large portfolio of games such as online classic slot, poker and table games;
Chance to bet in popular and in-the-sport event;
All-inclusive services: casino, restaurants, nightclub, show arena, hotel, etc.;
Positive reward system where one is able to earn points and get bonuses.

blocks.text: Disadvantages

items: Minimum bets on certain tables are high;
The potential queues in gaming zones during the time of maximum activity;
It is hard to locate parking sometimes because of the number of guests;
The visual update of the hotel building is required in accordance with the style of the Casino Windsor.

blocks.text: Casino Windsor Games

Casino Windsor, it gives a spectacular assortment of casino games. It also has a number of gaming rooms in which clients can enjoy the traditional slots, table games, poker, and also make sports bets.
Slots
Casino Windsor offers more than 1,550 slot machines to the players. This large variety will enable the players to bypass the queue and get to play their favorite games immediately.
Slots have average minimum bet and high roller features. A variety of slots have bonus features and progressive jackpots.
Table Games
Casino Windsor offers the highest betting limits in Ontario:

items: Up to C$50,000 on craps;
Up to C$50,000 on roulette;
Up to C$25,000 on blackjack;
Up to C$15,000 on baccarat and pai gow.

blocks.text: Whether you're a beginner or an experienced player, you're guaranteed to find a gaming room to suit your taste at Casino Windsor.
Poker Room
Casino Windsor poker room opens at 12.00 pm on Friday and closes at 6.00 am on Monday and noon on Monday and closes at 10.00 pm on Thursday.
The poker room has 14 tables of Texas Hold-Em, Omaha and Seven-Card Stud. You will also be able to engage in tournaments and stay aware of the existing and existing promotions.
Sports Betting

Casino Windsor has got a sports fan room. In this case, the customers will have an opportunity to view live streams and make pre-match and live bets. The casino has a large variety of sporting events in Canada and other parts of the world.
Casino Windsor Special Bonuses and Offers

Casino Windsor offers a rich and rewarding bonus program, regular promotions, and special offers. New and returning customers of this land-based Canadian casino in Ontario can take advantage of these offers.
Caesars Rewards

This is a special rewards program offered at Casino Windsor. Members can register online or at the casino. The goal is simple: play and order at bars, restaurants, and hotels. Your activity earns you loyalty points.
The more points you earn, the higher your level—Gold, Platinum, Diamond, and Seven Star. Each new level unlocks additional opportunities and exclusive offers.
Monthly Promotions

Casino Windsor runs special promotions every month with the chance to win cash. Each bonus comes with special terms and conditions. So, plan your visit to Casino Windsor, sign up for the rewards program, and be prepared to claim your gift.
Casino Windsor Deposit Methods

Casino Windsor is a land based gaming facility. Thus, it employs other methods of deposits than online casinos. Customers are able to deposit money in their games floor. They are able to buy chips at the cashier or use top up player cards. The card is applied in slot machines and electronic tables.

Players have a chance to top up their deposit and buy chips with a bank card or money. Visit the cashier or at self service terminals. The members of the loyalty program earn points which they can use to play free.
Casino Windsor Withdrawal Methods
The cashier and special terminals can also be used to withdraw the money at the land-based gaming complex. The can of chips can be converted to cash or a bank card.
When taking money, identification and player card is a necessity. This will ensure that you are qualified to get your winnings.
One should also take into account the upper restrictions on one-time payments. These can be different based on your status in the rewards program and the terms of the game.
Casino Windsor License

Casino Windsor is a casino that is governed by the Ontario province, Canada. This entertainment complex is in full compliance with the existing gambling regulations in Canada and has a license. Thus, there is no doubt that all the games will be fair and safe, and the conditions of operating the casino are as open as possible.
Casino Windsor App for Rewards Program

It is illogical that the Casino Windsor provides its customers with a mobile application. It is a fully terrestrial entertainment center based on live gaming. Nonetheless, the mobile version of the site is usable. It gives you all the information and gives you the opportunity to log in to see your progress in the rewards program.
The Casino Windsor Rewards Program is also available on a mobile app to players. Android and iOS applications are sold in the official stores. They offer several features:

items: Seeing your rewards point balance;
Looking at possible bonuses and promotion;
Notifications regarding event and promotions;
Racking up points in casinos, cafes and restaurants.

blocks.text: It is a brick and mortar casino but the app makes the interaction with the customer easier and better.
Casino Windsor Available Currencies

Casino Windsor is situated in Ontario, Canada. Thus, the Canadian dollar is the major and universal currency of all transactions. This is on any form of casino bets, payment in restaurants and bars, and purchase of chips, etc.

The currency exchange offices that are situated in the complex and open everyday can be used by international players. Acceptance of payments using foreign bank cards is also accepted. Despite this, however, consider the existing bank exchange rate and other charges.
Languages ​​at Casino Windsor
Casino Windsor uses English as its major service language. Nonetheless, the representatives of entertainment complexes speak French as well, since Canada is the two-language country.
The global village usually receives tourists of the United States, Europe, and Asia. Thus, the Casino Windhor employees are willing to help with other languages, in case of necessity.
The official rewards program member websites and mobile app of the Casino Windsor are also in the English language only.
Casino Windsor Support Team
Casino Windsor's security team is available 24/7. You can contact them in several ways:

items: via the casino's reception desk and customer service representatives;
via the hotline listed on the website;
via email for hotel guests and rewards program members.

blocks.text: Casino Windsor staff are ready to assist with any questions.
FAQ About Casino Windsor
Is it possible to make bets on the Internet at Casino Windsor?
No. Casino Windsor is a purely land-based casino. Betting is done on the premises.
Can I use US dollars?
Yes. Nevertheless, the players have to trade in currency within the internal exchange rate of the casino.
Should I make a registration prior to playing?
Does one need an ID to enter the casino? To enroll in the rewards program, one is required to register free at the reception desk or with the use of the site.
What should the dress code be at Casino Windsor?
There is no formal casino in Casino Windsor. Nevertheless, you are advised to dress in a smart manner and act socially in the right way.
Can one take pictures in Casino Windsor?
The gaming rooms do not allow photography or recording of videos. This however is not the case in the restaurant and the lounge facilities.

games.title: Casino Windsor Canada Games: Slots, Tables & Poker Experience
games.description: Discover Casino Windsor Canada's exciting range of games, from classic slots and progressive jackpots to blackjack, roulette, and poker tables. Enjoy a world-class gaming floor at Caesars Windsor, one of Canada’s premier casinos.

blocks.text: Casino Windsor Canada Games: A World of Excitement, Emotions, and Big Wins

Caesars Windsor or Casino Windsor Canada is not only a gambling facility but one of the greatest entertainment spots in Canada. The casino is located on the shores of the Detroit River, facing the American city of the same name, in the fusion of luxury, excitement and first-class service.

In contrast to the Internet, the Casino Windsor is a brick and mortar casino where all the aspects are created on the basis of real life feelings: the ringing of money, the turns of the reel, the excitement on the poker table, the face-to-face communication with the other participants of the game. Meanwhile, it is technologically advanced and modern, with a huge variety of entertainments, including over 1,550 slot machines and 85 table and card games, an in-house poker and sports betting room.
Slots

The key to Casino Windsor Canada Games is slot machines, and probably the main factor that brings many guests back each and every time. The casino has more than 1,550 slots that have a large selection of themes, betting material and mechanics.
The portfolio consists of standard one-armed bandits in three reels and standard BAR and 7 symbols, and advanced video slots in a gorgeous image, bonus games, and progressive jackpots.
Special reference is given to IGT, Aristocrat, Bally, and Konami games that are the leading global providers. This ensures that the gameplay is of high quality as well as clear payouts.
Table and Card Games

Whereas slots represent simple pure fun, table and card games are a mix of intelligence, planning and instinct. The Casino Windsor Canada has more than 85 gaming tables that have something to offer everybody.
This is where the most popular classic games are found:

items: Blackjack is a classical game that is not only about being lucky but also to think and be able to think;
Roulette as a symbol of casino and a source of real excitement. Casino Windsor offers both the European and American versions;
Craps is a classic dice game that makes one get a real Las Vegas feel;
Baccarat is a sophisticated game to play when one feels the style and calmness.

blocks.text: There are also VIP rooms with more betting limits and personal attention to the guests who want to be treated elite. In this case, you have the chance to spend time in privacy and comfort and not to miss the excitement of an actual game.
Moreover, dealers of Casino Windsor are professionals. They not only organize the games but also assist the beginners to feel at ease, clarify the game rules, and reveal the subtleties.
Casino Windsor Poker Room

The Poker Room is another special place in the Casino Windsor Canada Games, it is large and a contemporary room that has a competitive environment. There are cash games of different limits, Texas Holdem and Omaha tournaments, which are commonly played here.

The poker room is fully equipped with high-tech items: comfortable chairs of leather type, professional tables, modern lighting and friendly personnel. Tourists have access to room service, and the ambiance is light and easy going, particularly when it comes to long tournaments.

Casino Windsor has both amateur and professional players. The participants of tournaments come not only to Ontario and the US but also to the surrounding region, and the pools of prizes make the participation especially appealing.

To the novices in the poker world, the employees are glad to clarify the rules and assist you to select the right table. The poker room places a premium on friendliness, fun and competition rather than on high stakes.
Sports Betting and Streaming at Casino Windsor

The customers of the casinos today do not just want to play but also be involved in sporting activities worldwide. This is why Casino Windsor has designed a sports betting area, which is spacious and hi-tech, also a place that combines the atmosphere of a sportsbook and a lounge bar.

The twenty-dozen or so sports bets available at this room include hockey and football, basketball, tennis, and UFC fights. The room also has a lot of HD screens that present the live matches, information panels with odds and results.

Visitors are able to make bets live (Live Betting), that is, directly during the match and this makes the experience even more thrilling. It is all made comfortable; luxurious chairs and comfortable tables and the option to order drinks and food to your seat.

The special aspect of the room is that it is part of the Caesars Rewards program, implying that all stakes give points that can be redeemed in the future and obtained in the form of bonuses, meals, or rooms.
The ambience here is similar to the finest Las Vegas sports bars: fans screaming, winning, and feeling like they are in the middle of it all.

app.title: Casino Windsor Canada App: Stay Connected to Caesars Windsor
app.description: Download the Casino Windsor Canada app to explore the latest promotions, entertainment schedule, and hotel deals. Stay connected to Caesars Windsor Resort from your phone, access loyalty rewards, and plan your next visit easily.

blocks.text: Casino Windsor Canada App: Modern Access to Caesars' World of Gambling and Rewards

The Canadian entertainment industry is evolving continuously and Casino Windsor Canada also called Caesars Windsor is not left behind in the digital change. Nowadays, visitors do not have to find unique applications or install bulky software to find the latest information, bonuses, or hotels.

All they require is their smartphone. The casino does not have its own mobile application, but users can access the mobile version of the Web site, which is adapted and can install the official Caesars Rewards application that links all Caesars Entertainment clientele globally.
Casino Windsor Canada Mobile Website: Always at Your Fingertips

Although the Casino Windsor Canada App is not an independent application, a user can have practically the same level of convenience with the mobile version of the official webpage, caesars.com/caesars-windsor. This site is customer-focused, and it is aimed towards the modern customers who are familiar with handling all these through their phone: booking the rooms and being involved in promotions.

The mobile site includes all the important functions: you will be able to know the schedule of events, to see the latest promotions and special offers, make a reservation in the Caesars Windsor hotel, and you will be able to review the menu of the restaurant and bar. The visitors can also find detailed information regarding the rooms and table games of the casino as well as tournaments.

The key benefit of the mobile version is that it is compatible and can be used with all platforms and operating systems: iOS, Android, and Windows. The site can fit on the screen and is user-friendly no matter the model of the phone.
Why Casino Windsor Doesn't Have its Own App

On the surface, the absence of an exclusive application may appear to be a disadvantage, but in the case of Casino Windsor Canada, it is the contrary. This casino on land is focused on establishing the environment of live communication, excitement, and high-quality service.

Casino Windsor does not have remote betting, online slots, and online poker as it does in the online sites. All it is done live: visitors visit the event to have fun, watch live games, restaurants, and performances. Thus, one does not need a different application.

Moreover, the centralization strategy is followed by the Caesars Entertainment brand itself. In other words it develops one solution that is applicable to all its casinos in North America. The company does not have many separate applications but has one global platform - the Caesars Rewards App that consolidates the loyalty system.
Caesars Rewards App: Your Personal Companion in the World of Caesars

The casino does not have a mobile app, but the Caesars Rewards App serves to compensate for it more than that. It is the official Caesars Entertainment app of rewards program members, which is also present in Casino Windsor Canada.

The users will be able to monitor their bonus points, reserve, be informed about new deals, and get individual offers. Any customer of Casino Windsor will be able to create a free account and connect it to the app.

Caesars Rewards App is available in both app store (iOS) and Google Play (Android). It is also free and rated high by the users in terms of the friendly interface and stability. Once installed, you will be required to log in using the information of your Rewards account or create an account in case you are not a member.
The most important characteristics of the app are:

items: Look at your members and Reward Credits;
Monitor your level (Gold, Platinum, Diamond, Seven Stars) and the benefits that come with it;
Get Casino Windsor and other chain resorts offering you exclusive deals;
Fast room, restaurant, and show reservations;
See your visit and spending history, which makes it easy to plan your next trip.

blocks.text: The application is a personal assistant that does not only remind you but can also assist you in maximising your bonuses.
Benefits of a Mobile Experience for Casino Windsor Guests

Visitors can use the mobile version of the Caesars Rewards web site and mobile application to provide the flexibility and ease commonly unavailable in casinos. You do not have to stand in a queue at the check-in desk or have to go searching to find paper promotional flyers: you can know it all before you are even at home or on your way to the casino.

Moreover, the Caesars Rewards system can be synchronized, thus users have just one account usable not only in Canada, but also in dozens of other Caesars locations in the US and abroad. This renders membership particularly useful to those tourists who frequent Caesars casinos.

It is also important to mention that the Casino Windsor mobile site is eligible for a secured link (SSL), which ensures safety of user information. Every single action such as entering your Rewards account or ordering services is encrypted.

login.title: Casino Windsor Canada Login: Access Your Caesars Rewards Account
login.description: Log in to your Casino Windsor Canada account to manage your Caesars Rewards, view exclusive offers, and check your upcoming events. Secure access for hotel guests, players, and loyalty members of Caesars Windsor Resort in Ontario.

blocks.text: Casino Windsor Canada Login: Your Passport to a World of Luxury and Excitement

Casino Windsor Canada, and Caesars Windsor as it is also called is not just an entertainment event. It is an escape into the universe of style, comfort, and dynamism of a dynamic gaming world. In order to enter the casino, the guests have to undergo a certain procedure of registration and follow the rules that should be followed as befits the level of the place where it is offered. The process of the login, dress code, and behavior are also described and how to join the exclusive Caesars Rewards program below.
Casino Windsor Entry Procedure

The casino is either through the main entrance to the slots floor or through the Caesars Windsor Hotel. The fancy interior and hospitable workers will be the first thing that will impress the visitors.
Guests should have a valid ID in order to enter, with no less than 19 years of age (Ontario law). The accepted documents include:

items: Passport or driving license;
Canadian Citizenship Card;
Ontario Photo ID Card.

blocks.text: Visitors are allowed to access the casino area after being verified by documents.

The customers that are already registered with Caesars Rewards can enter with their membership card and have expedited access. All a person has to do is provide the card to the reader at the entrance or a security officer.

In case you are staying in Caesars Windsor hotel, the casino can be located directly via the internal walkways. This comes in handy, particularly during the evenings when the queue at the main entrance is huge.
Dress Code at Casino Windsor: Style and Attire

The dress code of Casino Windsor is in a relatively formal mode, which is just as befitting to a luxurious venue. Visitors do not need to dress up in formal evening clothes, still, there are some regulations they should follow:
The acceptable at Casino Windsor is as follows:

items: clean and neat casual attire;
jeans, trousers, shirts, blouses, and closed-toe shoes;
evening jackets, evening shirts, and cocktail dresses are acceptable in the night.

blocks.text: The next one is however not advisable:

items: sleeveless T- Shirts or beach wear or sports wear;
open-toe shoes (sandals, flip-flops), ragged or ripped clothing;
wearing foul-minded slogans or images.

blocks.text: It is important to point out that the dress code can be harsher at night or in case of events. The VIP and premium restaurants have been promoted to use business casual. Security has the authority to reject entry in case of requirements not being satisfied.
Casino Windsor Rules of Conduct: Basic Etiquette and Security
Casino Windsor Canada takes care of the comfort of its guests. Casinos are regulated by internal regulations and Caesars Entertainment regulations in behavior.
In order to ensure a friendly and respectful environment, visitors will be asked to:

items: Be respectful of personnel and other players. Protests, loudness, or irritating conduct is not acceptable;
Observe age restrictions. Access to 19 only; underage individuals are not allowed;
The gaming rooms do not allow photography and video recording. The taking of photographs is not allowed except in specially fixed zones;
Smoking is done in separate rooms outside the game room;

Responsible Gaming. At Casino Windsor, the concepts of Responsible Gaming are encouraged. Individual limits or a temporary cessation of playing can be established by players using the Responsible Gaming Center;
Guests above the age of 19 are allowed to consume alcoholic drinks but not to the point of drunkenness. The personnel can limit access to the game in situations of clearly intoxicated players.

blocks.text: These regulations are not somehow restricting, it is only a way to provide the pleasant and safe environment in which all people will be able to have a good vacation.
Caesars Rewards: Registration and Membership Benefits
Casino Windsor also provides a Caesars Rewards program membership to its loyal customers and individuals who desire comfort as one of the most successful loyalty programs used in North America.
Online registration is in two forms:

items: Internet- through the official Caesars Reward web site;
via the mobile app.

blocks.text: In Casino Windsor, registration can be done at the on-site registration points whereby, the staff will assist you in registering and receiving a membership card.

Participating in the account creation will demand your name, date of birth, email address, and phone number. Once registered, the guests are issued with a physical card which can be used within the casino, restaurants, the hotel and even Caesars resorts on the continental scale.
When Entry May Be Denied
Casino Windsor Canada has the right to refuse entry to any of its guests in some situations notwithstanding our hospitality. This normally happens in the following situations:

items: under 19 years of age;
failure to identify validly;
violation of the dress code;
under the influence of intoxicating liquor, drugs, etc.;
violent or uncivilized demeanor;
breakage of Responsible Gaming regulations.

blocks.text: The decisions regarding security are determined case by case and consider the circumstance and interests of other guests.
